00027 public class SimulinkEcoreCreator {
00028         
00029         protected SimulinkFactory factory;
00030         protected Model theModel;
00031         protected HashMap<String, System> systemRepository;
00032         protected HashMap<UUID, ProtoObject> repository;
00033         
00034         public SimulinkEcoreCreator(SimulinkFactory aFactory) {
00035                 factory = aFactory;
00036                 systemRepository        = new HashMap<String, System>();
00037                 repository                      = new HashMap<UUID, ProtoObject>();
00038         }
00039 
00040 
00041         public Model newModel(String modelName) {
00042                 theModel = factory.createModel();
00043                 theModel.setName( modelName );
00044                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( theModel );
00045                 return theModel;
00046         }
00047 
00048 
00049         private void setUUIDAndAddToRepository(ProtoObject object) {
00050                 UUID uuid = UUID.randomUUID();
00051                 object.setUuid(uuid.toString());
00052                 repository.put(uuid, object);
00053         }
00054 
00055 
00056         public Model getTopElement() {
00057                 return theModel;
00058         }
00059 
00060 
00061         public System addRootSystem(String name) {
00062                 System aSystem = obtainSystem(name);
00063                 theModel.setRoot(aSystem);
00064                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( aSystem );              
00065                 return aSystem;
00066         }
00067 
00068 
00069         /*
00070          * If the system is not in the repository it will be created
00071          */
00072         private System obtainSystem(String name) {
00073                 System aSystem = findSystem( name );
00074                 if ( aSystem == null ) {
00075                         aSystem = newSystem(name);
00076                 }
00077                 return aSystem;
00078         }
00079 
00080 
00081         private System newSystem(String name) {
00082                 System aSystem = factory.createSystem();
00083                 aSystem.setName(name);
00084                 aSystem.setSimulinkName(name);
00085                 systemRepository.put(name, aSystem);
00086                 theModel.getParts().add(aSystem);
00087                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( aSystem );              
00088                 return aSystem;
00089         }
00090 
00091         
00092         public System findSystem(String name) {
00093                 return systemRepository.get( name );
00094         }
00095 
00096         public static Port findPortWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00097                 Port port = findOutportWithin(portName, aSystem);
00098                 if ( port == null ) {
00099                         port = findInportWithin(portName, aSystem);
00100                 }
00101                 return port;
00102         }
00103         
00104         public static Outport findOutportWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00105                 Outport port = null;
00106                 EList<System> targetSystems = 
00107                         createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(aSystem);
00108                 for (System sys : targetSystems ) {
00109                                 port = findOutportInSystem( portName, sys );
00110                                 if (port != null) { return port; }
00111                 }
00112                 return port;
00113         }
00114 
00115         public static Inport findInportWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00116                 Inport port = null;
00117                 EList<System> targetSystems = 
00118                         createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(aSystem);
00119                 for (System sys : targetSystems ) {
00120                                 port = findInportInSystem( portName, sys );
00121                                 if (port != null) { return port; }
00122                 }
00123                 return port;
00124         }
00125 
00126         private static EList<System> createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(
00127                         System aSystem) {
00128                 EList<SystemReference> childrenList = aSystem.getChildren();
00129                 EList<System> targetSystems = getAllTargets( childrenList );
00130                 targetSystems.add(aSystem);
00131                 return targetSystems;
00132         }
00133 
00134 
00135         private static EList<System> getAllTargets(EList<SystemReference> childrenList) {
00136                 BasicEList<System> result = new BasicEList<System>( childrenList.size() );
00137                 for (SystemReference aRef : childrenList) {
00138                         result.add( aRef.getTarget() );
00139                 }
00140                 return result;
00141         }
00142 
00143 
00144         private static Outport findOutportInSystem(String portName, System aSystem) {
00145                 return findPortInList( portName, aSystem.getOutports());
00146         }
00147 
00148         private static Inport findInportInSystem(String portName, System aSystem) {
00149                 return findPortInList( portName, aSystem.getInports());
00150         }
00151         
00152         private static <IOPort extends Port> IOPort findPortInList(String portName, 
00153                         EList<IOPort> ports) {
00154                 for (IOPort aPort : ports) {
00155                         if (aPort.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(portName)) {
00156                                 return aPort;
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159                 return null;
00160         }
00161 
00162         
00163         public SystemReference addSystem(PropertyList pList) {          
00164                 
00165                 String name             = pList.getName();
00166                 String instanceName = pList.getInstanceName();
00167                 System parent           = pList.getParent();
00168                 SystemReference sysRef = addSystemInstance(name, parent, instanceName);         
00169                 return sysRef;
00170         }
00171         
00172         private SystemReference addSystemInstance(String name, System parent,
00173                         String instanceName) {
00174                 
00175                 System aSystem = obtainSystem(name);
00176                 SystemReference reference = factory.createSystemReference();
00177                 reference.setName(instanceName);
00178                 reference.setParent(parent);
00179                 reference.setTarget(aSystem);
00180                 parent.getChildren().add(reference);
00181                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( reference );            
00182                 return reference;
00183         }
00184 
00185 
00186         /*
00187          * comply with older API, probably unused
00188          */
00189         public System addSystem(String name, System parent, String instanceName) {
00190                 SystemReference sysRef = addSystemInstance(name, parent, instanceName);
00191                 return sysRef.getTarget();
00192         }
00193         
00194         /*
00195          * comply with older API, probably unused
00196          * name and instanceName are the same
00197          */ 
00198         public System addSystem(String name, System parent) {
00199                 return addSystem(name, parent, name);
00200         }
00201 
00202 
00203         public Inport addInPort(String name, System parent) {
00204                 Inport inport = factory.createInport();
00205                 parent.getInports().add( inport );
00206                 inport.setName(name);
00207                 inport.setParent(parent);
00208                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( inport );               
00209                 return inport;
00210         }
00211 
00212 
00213         public Outport addOutPort(String name, System parent) {
00214                 Outport outport = factory.createOutport();
00215                 parent.getOutports().add( outport );
00216                 outport.setName(name);
00217                 outport.setParent(parent);
00218                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( outport );              
00219                 return outport;
00220         }
00221 
00222         public Line addLineBetween(String name, System source, System destination, 
00223                         System parent) {
00224                 Outport outport = source.getOutports().get(0);
00225                 Inport inport = destination.getInports().get(0);
00226                 return addLine(name, outport, inport, parent);
00227         }
00228         
00229         public Line addLine(String name, Port source, Port destination, 
00230                         System parent) {
00231                 Line line = factory.createLine();
00232                 line.setName(name);
00233                 line.setSource(source);
00234                 line.setDestination(destination);
00235                 parent.getLines().add(line);
00236                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( line );
00237                 return line;
00238         }
00239         
00240         public void addLines(ArrayList<LineInfo> lines) throws PortNotFoundException {
00241                 String name;
00242                 Port srcPort, dstPort;
00243                 System parent;
00244                 for ( LineInfo lineInfo : lines ) {
00245                         name = lineInfo.getName();
00246                         parent = lineInfo.getLineParent();
00247                         srcPort = this.findPort( lineInfo.getSrcPort() );
00248                         dstPort = this.findPort( lineInfo.getDstPort() );                       
00249                         addLine( name, srcPort, dstPort, parent );
00250                 }
00251         }
00252 
00253 
00254         public System findSystem(UUID uuid) {
00255                 return (System) repository.get(uuid);
00256         }
00257 
00258         public SystemReference findSystemReference(UUID uuid) {
00259                 return (SystemReference) repository.get(uuid);
00260         }
00261 
00262         public Port findPort(UUID uuid) {
00263                 return (Port) repository.get(uuid);
00264         }
00265                 
00266         public Line findLine(UUID uuid) {
00267                 return (Line) repository.get(uuid);
00268         }
